% A LaTex Template for generating ancilliary information forItem
% Diabetes Group Allied Services for Australian General Practitioners
% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{report}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{multicol}
\usepackage{supertabular}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage[a4paper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=0.5cm,bmargin=0.6cm,lmargin=0.5cm,rmargin=0.5cm}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{3}
\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}
\setlength{\parskip}{\medskipamount}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\usepackage{array}
\makeatletter
\DeclareRobustCommand{\checkbox}{\framebox(5,5){$\bullet$}}
\DeclareRobustCommand{\emptycheckbox}{\framebox(5,5){}}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{5.5cm}>{\centering}p{8cm}>{\raggedright}p{4cm}}
  \textbf{!clinic-name}\\
  !clinic-branch \\
  !clinic-street \\
  !clinic-suburb\\
  Phone:!clinic-phone\\
  Fax  :!clinic-fax
     & \textbf{!heading
      } &
 \textbf{!name} \\
 !street \\
 !suburb \\
 !birthdate !age\\
 !medicare !card-position\\
 !patient-phone
 !patient-mobile}
\\
\end{tabular}

!provider 
!dear-recipient %will only be filled if the recipient is a person not a provider

Thank you for seeing !firstname age !age for an assessment and development of a plan under the Medicare Diabetes Group Allied Services funding scheme. 
To assist your initial assessment I enclose information about some health issues that I believe are relevant to this patient's care. 
My initial recommendations for numbers of sessions !session-allocation-suggestions but will be happy to review this after I receive the report of your initial assessment,
at which time I will write you a referral finalising the numbers and types of sessions to be undertaken. !special-notes \\ %if present any special extra notes needed for this patient.
 \\
!additional-health-issues
\\\\
\textbf{Medications}\\\\
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{7.5cm}>{\raggedright}p{3.0cm}>{\raggedright}p{4cm}> {\raggedright}p{3.5cm} }
!medications
\tabularnewline
\end{tabular}
\\\\
\textbf{Allergies:}\\
{\small !allergies

\hrule
\hrule                                                                
\\\\\\
%\text{Yours Sincerely}\\\\\\

%!practioner-name 

\end{document}
